title: Obsession: The Jodi Arias Story
description: In this Dateline classic, Josh Mankiewicz takes an in-depth look into the case and trial of Jodi Arias, the 32-year-old Arizona woman who admitted to killing her former boyfriend, Travis Alexander.  Originally aired on NBC on May 10, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
